title: Personal Access Token Request
description: Details of a Personal Access Token Request.

id.description: Unique identifier of the request for access via fine-grained personal access token. Used as the `pat_request_id` parameter in the list and review API calls.

permissions_added.description: New requested permissions, categorized by type of permission.

permissions_upgraded.description: Requested permissions that elevate access for a previously approved request for access, categorized by type of permission.

permissions_result.description: Permissions requested, categorized by type of permission. This field incorporates `permissions_added` and `permissions_upgraded`.

oneOf.description: The number of repositories the token is requesting access to. This field is only populated when `repository_selection` is `subset`.
An array of repository objects the token is requesting access to. This field is only populated when `repository_selection` is `subset`.

private.description: Whether the repository is private or public.

created_at.description: Date and time when the request for access was created.

token_id.description: Unique identifier of the user's token. This field can also be found in audit log events and the organization's settings for their PAT grants.

token_name.description: The name given to the user's token. This field can also be found in an organization's settings page for Active Tokens.

token_expired.description: Whether the associated fine-grained personal access token has expired.

oneOf.description: Date and time when the associated fine-grained personal access token expires.
Date and time when the associated fine-grained personal access token was last used for authentication.
